metadata.ttm:title: Re Representation of Non Novated Merger/Acquisition
metadata.ttm:desc: A Non-novated Merger or Acquisition implies that all Terms and Conditions of your GSA Contract are not being acquired by or merged with your Company. In the event of a merger or acquisition of this type, you must submit this Mod notifying GSA that such a Non-novated Merger or Acquisition has taken place. Note that if the merger does not require Novation, a different Modification (the Novation Agreement Modification) will be necessary.

div.p: eMod allows you to submit modifications regarding
Non-Novated Mergers or Acquisitions.
A non-novated merger or acquisition implies that
all terms and conditions of your GSA contract are
not being transferred to the firm being acquired by
or merged with your company.
In the event of a merger or acquisition of this
type, you must submit this mod notifying GSA that
such a non-novated merger or acquisition has taken
place.
Note that if the merger does require novation, a
different modification - Novation Agreement - will
be necessary.
Within the text box, provide a detailed
description of the reason you are re-representing
your merger or acquisition.
You need to provide GSA with information regarding
how the merger or acquisition does or does
not impact your company.
Specifically, you should note how the merger
affects your business size classification, your
socio-economic status, or any other information the
CO may need to be aware of.
When you are finished click the "Save and
Continue" button.
